Author: dised
Text: i feel the same way! i don’t know what it is about college, but it’s so hard for me to make friends here. even when i was putting in effort to go out to parties, join a sports team, etc, i still couldn’t find anyone i clicked with.   you mentioned you like a lot of different tv shows, maybe you could try and watch some in a common area? that might be a good conversation starter to try and connect. at my dorm, a bunch of people had an atla marathon which was super cool  i know ed’s can make it so hard to go out and interact with people, but just in my case, exposure therapy really helps. if you ever want to vent, feel free to dm me!
